resources.string: Your multilingual text summarization software, AISummarizer, offers a more efficient method of text reading! Your business requires the reading of a considerable number of documents: we have the solution to reduce up to 80% of your time reading and get the gist of the content. It is very easy to use, the software produces a summary of the text of your documents and web pages as well as a synthesis of the entire contents of a folder on your computer with just one click. Also, through the API of AISummarizer you can have real-time summaries of your search results on top search engines as well as the summaries of social networks toolss links. Through years of research, the method developed by AISummarizer can reproduce a summary consistent with the original meaning through a sophisticated linguistic analysis of text. Efficient both in local and foreign languages, AISummarizer is associated with a language translation module. You will get the summary of the content in 21 different languages. AISummarizer is the first software of text summarization to offer to the user to get instantly all images, videos, photos of a web page by only one click. Just submit a web page and click the button « Only images ».

For Summarize: Once you select “Summarize” you will get Text, File, Web.
Text 1. Choose your language from the list. \n 2. Put your text , select and summarize Button. \n 3. You will receive 20% below your basic summary . You can maximize your screen , you can change the outline % of crack , according to the list % .
File 1. You need to select the files before using the iTunes Connect.\n2. Choose AISummarizer iTunes , crack and you can click the + button to select the .TXT files from your computer to be ( + more ) to get and press the button on the right \n3. You can find a file in the file selection options . Choose your language and file summarize, Remaining the same or text .
Web 1. Copy a link to a web page.\n2. Select language of the same or a Web page link. \n3. The attached summary. The rest of the things are the same or text file.
